TC-ELEM-001: Verify successful submission with valid data.
TC-ELEM-002: Verify form behavior with an invalid email format.
TC-ELEM-003: Verify the expand and collapse functionality of the tree.
TC-ELEM-004: Verify selecting a parent checkbox ("Home") selects all its children.
TC-ELEM-005: Verify deselecting a parent checkbox ("Home") deselects all its children.
TC-ELEM-006: Verify selecting an individual child checkbox.
TC-ELEM-007: Verify a parent is automatically selected when all its children are checked manually.
TC-ELEM-008: Verify a parent is automatically deselected when one of its children is unchecked.
TC-ELEM-011: Verify that only one radio button can be selected at a time (mutual exclusivity).
TC-ELEM-012: Verify the "No" radio button is disabled and cannot be selected.
TC-ELEM-013: Verify adding a new record with valid data.
TC-ELEM-016: Verify form validation for invalid data.
TC-ELEM-017: Verify search functionality with an existing value.
TC-ELEM-018: Verify search functionality with a non-existent value.
TC-ELEM-019: Verify changing the number of rows displayed per page.
TC-ELEM-023: Verify a single click on the "Double Click Me" button has no effect.
TC-ELEM-024: Verify a left click on the "Right Click Me" button has no effect.
TC-ELEM-025: Verify that messages from different buttons can co-exist.
TC-ELEM-026: Verify standard button activation using the keyboard.
TC-ELEM-027: Verify the static "Home" link opens a new tab.
TC-ELEM-028: Verify the dynamic "Home" link opens a new tab.
TC-ELEM-029: Verify the "Created" link triggers a 201 response.
TC-ELEM-030: Verify the "No Content" link triggers a 204 response.
TC-ELEM-031: Verify the "Moved" link triggers a 301 response.
TC-ELEM-036: Verify the response message updates correctly when clicking multiple API links.
TC-ELEM-037: Verify the valid image loads correctly.
TC-ELEM-038: Verify the broken image fails to load and returns a 404 error.
TC-ELEM-040: Verify successful file selection for upload.
TC-ELEM-041: Verify behavior when the file selection is canceled.
TC-ELEM-042: Verify a disabled button becomes enabled after 5 seconds.
TC-ELEM-043: Verify a button's text color changes after 5 seconds.
TC-ELEM-044: Verify a button becomes visible after 5 seconds.

2. Wait for approximately 6 seconds.
3. Scan the page again.

TC-ELEM-001:
A summary box appears below the form.
The summary box contains four lines, correctly displaying the Name, Email, Current Address, and Permanent Address exactly as entered.
TC-ELEM-002:
The form does not submit.
The "Email" input field's border turns red to indicate an error.
No summary box is displayed below the form.
TC-ELEM-003:
1. The "Desktop", "Documents", and "Downloads" directories become visible.
2. The "WorkSpace" and "Office" directories become visible.
3. The "WorkSpace" and "Office" directories are hidden.
4. The entire tree collapses, showing only the "Home" checkbox. The result text area remains empty throughout.
TC-ELEM-004:
All checkboxes in the entire tree become checked.
The result text area displays:
You have selected : home, desktop, notes, commands, documents, workspace, react, angular, veu, office, public, private, classified, general, downloads, wordFile, excelFile
TC-ELEM-005: All checkboxes in the tree become unchecked. The result text area becomes empty (the "You have selected :" text disappears).
TC-ELEM-006:
The result text area displays:
You have selected : wordFile
TC-ELEM-007:
After step 4, the checkboxes for "React", "Angular", "Veu", AND "WorkSpace" are checked.

The result text area displays:
You have selected :
react
angular
veu
workspace
TC-ELEM-008:
The "WorkSpace" checkbox becomes unchecked automatically.
"React" is unchecked, but "Angular" and "Veu" remain checked.
The result text area updates to display:
You have selected :
angular
veu
TC-ELEM-009:
1. Initially, no radio button is selected and there is no result text.
2. The "Yes" radio button becomes selected.
3. The text "You have selected Yes" appears below the buttons.
TC-ELEM-010:
1. Initially, no radio button is selected and there is no result text.
2. The "Impressive" radio button becomes selected.
3. The text "You have selected Impressive" appears below the buttons.
TC-ELEM-011:
1. "Yes" is selected. The result text is "You have selected Yes".
2. The "Yes" button becomes unselected. The "Impressive" button becomes selected.
3. The result text updates to "You have selected Impressive".
TC-ELEM-012:
1. The "No" button is visually grayed out, indicating it is disabled.
2. The cursor changes to a "not-allowed" symbol (e.g., a circle with a slash through it).
3. Clicking the button has no effect. The button does not become selected, and no result text appears. The state of the other radio buttons does not change.
TC-ELEM-013:
The "Registration Form" modal closes.
A new row is added to the table containing the exact data entered.
The table now has 4 rows (if starting from the default 3).
TC-ELEM-014:
The "Registration Form" modal closes.
The row for "Cierra" is updated in the table.
The "Age" for Cierra's record now displays "45".
The "Salary" for Cierra's record now displays "15000".
Other fields in the row remain unchanged.
TC-ELEM-015:
The row containing the data for "Alden" is immediately removed from the web table.
The table now has 2 rows (if starting from the default 3).
TC-ELEM-016:
The "Registration Form" modal remains open.
The "Email" and "Age" input fields are highlighted with a red border, indicating a validation error.
No new record is added to the table.
TC-ELEM-017:
The table automatically filters to show only the row(s) containing the search term "Kierra".
In this case, only one row is displayed.
TC-ELEM-018:
The table body becomes empty.
The text "No rows found" is displayed in the center of the table area.
TC-ELEM-019:
The table re-renders to display a maximum of 5 rows on the current page.
The page navigation information updates (e.g., from "Page 1 of 1" to "Page 1 of 2").

TC-ELEM-039:
1. The browser initiates a file download.
2. The downloaded file is named sampleFile.jpeg.
3. The file is a valid JPEG image and can be opened successfully with a standard image viewer.
4. The file is not corrupted.
TC-ELEM-040:
The file selection dialog closes.
A file path is displayed on the webpage next to the button.
The displayed path is C:\fakepath\TestUpload.txt.
(Note: C:\fakepath\ is a security feature in modern browsers to prevent websites from knowing your local file structure. This specific text is expected.)
TC-ELEM-041:
The file selection dialog closes.
The page remains in its original state.
No file path is displayed next to the button.
TC-ELEM-042:
1. The button is visually grayed out and has the disabled HTML attribute.
2. The click action has no effect.
3. After the delay, the button is no longer grayed out and is clickable.
4. The click action produces a standard button-press visual effect.
TC-ELEM-043:
1. The button's text is black (or the default text color).
2. After the delay, the button's text color changes to red (#dc3545).
TC-ELEM-044:
1. The button is not present or visible in the page's Document Object Model (DOM).
2. After the delay, the button appears on the page below the "Color Change" button.
3. The newly visible button is enabled and clickable.
